Hero.subtitle: We generate a constant flow of quality customers for your business, so you can focus on what you do best: your work.

Problem.title: Do you provide services? This probably sounds familiar to you...

time.title: Time Vanishes
time.description: You spend more time looking for clients, answering messages, and handling calls than invoicing. Every hour spent on marketing is an hour not dedicated to your craft.

noise.title: Noise and Burnout
noise.description: Your phone won't stop ringing, but most are sales calls, inquiries with no real interest, or 'clients' just looking for the lowest price. The burnout is immense.

marketing.title: Marketing That Doesn't Work
marketing.description: You've tried posting on social media or creating a website, but the results aren't coming. Digital marketing seems like a complex, expensive maze with no clear return.

Solution.title: The Solution: A Digital Sales Agent Working for You 24/7
Solution.description: At Consultoria.System, we don't sell isolated marketing services. We've created an integrated system that acts as your own sales agent. A digital engine designed to attract, filter, and deliver only the business opportunities that truly matter. Forget chasing clients; we make them find you.

HowItWorks.title: The 4 Keys to Your Digital Agent

block1.title: We Put You on the Map (Literally).
block1.description: It's not enough to be on the internet; you have to be the first choice. We optimize your Google presence and local SEO so that when a customer searches for your services, your business appears at the top. Being first isn't vanity, it's business.
checklist: Local SEO strategy for your website and service area.
Online reputation management to lead the search results.

block2.title: Authority and Trust, Not Just 'Likes'.
block2.description: We don't use social media just to post. We create a content strategy that positions you as an expert in your field. We showcase the quality of your work, build trust, and turn followers into clients who already know you're the best option.
checklist: Strategic posts focused on demonstrating your value.
Attractive visual content that reflects your professionalism.

block3.title: Goodbye Noise, Hello Real Clients.
block3.description: Here's the magic. We implement an automation system via WhatsApp and a call protocol that filters out 90% of junk inquiries. The system operates 24/7, qualifies the potential client, and passes the contact to you only when they are ready for a serious quote.
checklist: WhatsApp Bot that responds and filters inquiries instantly.
You only receive notifications from verified clients.

block4.title: Your Best Salesperson is Your Satisfied Customers.
block4.description: We proactively encourage your happy customers to leave positive reviews on Google. Our proprietary system directs 5-star ratings directly to your public profile, while any constructive feedback comes to us privately so you can improve.
checklist: Private feedback management to protect your reputation.

time.title: + TIME
time.description: Get back up to 10 hours a week. Spend them invoicing, with your family, or on yourself. Your digital agent handles the rest.

quality.title: + QUALITY CLIENTS
quality.description: Stop competing on price. Attract clients who value your expertise and are willing to pay for it.

peace.title: + PEACE OF MIND
peace.description: Have the certainty that your business is constantly and predictably generating opportunities, even while you sleep.

FinalCta.title: Ready for your only job to be writing quotes?
FinalCta.subtitle: Let's talk for 15 minutes, no strings attached. We'll analyze your current situation and show you how your Digital Sales Agent can start generating results for your business from the first month.
